title: Baked garlic
description: By baking the garlic it softens the sharpness of the flavour and brings out it's sweetness.

default: 6 plump bulbs of garlic, tops taken off

steps: Place the garlic onto a baking sheet and drizzle with a little olive oil.
Sprinkle over a little rock salt and place in a hot oven for 20-30 minutes or until the cloves have softened.
Squeeze out the garlic purée from each clove and spread onto warmed bread.
